approach.title: The Trianglais Method
approach.description: Our unique triangular approach combines three fundamental pillars for effective language learning:

pillar1.title: Conversation
pillar1.description: Practice speaking from day one with interactive conversations and real-life scenarios.

pillar2.title: Grammar
pillar2.description: Solid grammatical foundation taught in a practical and understandable way.

pillar3.title: Culture
pillar3.description: Immerse yourself in the culture of the language to understand context and nuances.
